This form is for Canada customers only.  For International inquires, click here. For event sponsorship/donation requests, see 'Donations' page. For quicker responses on website-related inquiries, please complete and send the form below. Please provide us with accurate information to make this process as efficient as possible. The information we collect will only be used to respond to your message. Your information will not be distributed.

Rapala Canada
Normark, Inc.
1350 Phillip Murray Ave.
Oshawa, L1J 6Z9
Ontario, Canada

Customer Service
info@normarkcanada.com

If you are interested in becoming a Rapala dealer, please complete and send the form below. Your business name and personal contact information will be forwarded to a Rapala Sales Representative in your area. One of our representatives will contact you to further discuss your eligibility for becoming a Rapala dealer. It is also required that you have a valid resale or sales tax certificate to become a Rapala dealer.

Dealer inquiries outside of Canada, click here.

* First Name
* Last Name
* E-Mail Address
* Phone
* Business Name
* Business Address1
Business Address2
* City
* Province/Territory
* Postal Code

If you are currently a Rapala dealer and interested in having your business listed on our dealer locator, please complete and send the form below. It is also required that you are already a registered Rapala dealer to be listed on our Dealer Locator.

Rapala Insider

Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy

Address 1 Tips
  • This field is limited to 30 characters because the shipping label only has room for 30 characters. If your address is longer than this, (for instance, if there is an Apt \#, Suite \#, or a long street name that doesn't fit), please use the ' Address ' field, which has room for an additional 30 characters. If Address 2 is filled in, it will appear on the shipping label.
  • Postal Office Boxes or P.O. Boxes are NOT accepted as a shipping address.
  • A physical address is required for any order placed on Rapala.ca.
  • Unfortunately we are unable to ship to AFO/APO addresses at this time.
